title: million token NFT collection
body:
you stake million token to get a nft collection (like punks) of lions. each month 5% of the lions are airdroped the way they are determined to be airdroped will be a  lottrey system 

the longer you stake X the number of your coins you own = the number of tickets to win a lion 

 the more you hold the more likely you are to get get a lion each lion will have a minimum bid based on his characteristics 

now anyone who holds million token will be a idiot not to have his coins staked and get one of the 10,000 dollar lion 


if someone gets a lion he will be likely to sell that lion and use that money to buy more mm so he can stake more mm  to get more lions 

creating a infintate supply reduction demand indusing cycle with other
 people hearing this they will buy in but because most of the supply is locked  each buy will move the price higher and higher as there won't be any sellers 

so if person x owns 100 tokens and stakes those tokens for 15 years he has as much of a chance to get a lion as somone who stakes 1500 tokens for 1 year those lions will be as valuble as punks since there is a bottom floor and low supply causeing more peeople to buy mm and stake it 


 we have a ground bid for every million coin 1 dollar there should be a ground bid for every lion 
first 10% of lions realested will have the highest minimum bid and they will be very special lions with things that make them uniq and thats why the minimum bid shiould be higern


and every lion after that should be less and less special and thus the min bid on him should be less and less with the (first lions being like (zombie punks) and the last lions being just regular punks 


THIS WILL BE THE COLLEST NFT GAME/ LOTTERY AND ASSURE GET US TO OVER 1000 DOLLARS A COIN 

techlead or anyone who likes the idea and wants to help:
reach out to me on telegram my user name is: uponlymillion and lest get this out!

I WANT A MILLLLLLLLLLION NFT COLLECTION!!!!!
author: 0x245b97E2d5F68234B752EE001de381208f9e186f
